title: A good sup to help carry the game
body:
Pref not someone with hooks

Also someone please chant something on me so i can stop my losing streak </3 
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Matsuzaka544

just got demoted lol

replies.body:
I've seen Rakan do some amazing things. Full AP sona can go hard... but overall don't throw your ADC under the bus if they are snowballing.

For a non-meta option, try Fiddlesticks - nobody expects it, fear the ADC if they attempt to push yours.
